tomato.name: Volcanic Blaze
tomato.description: A sizzling shades which ignites the soul.

red.name: Ember Glow
red.description: Radiating warmth & intensity like a burning fire.

crimson.name: Scarlet Tempest
crimson.description: A stormy hue that embodies passionate fervor.

ruby.name: Crimson Glow
ruby.description: Captures the Ruby's vibe, radiating passion & allure.

jade.name: Jungle Oasis
jade.description: Symbolizes the lush greenery of a natural oasis.

iris.name: Tranquil Jade Oasis
iris.description: Blends green and blues, reminiscent of precious jade.

pink.name: Enchanting Blush
pink.description: A captivating color that evokes tender feelings.

plum.name: Queen's Dusk
plum.description: A royal hue, embodying the elegance & grace of a queen

purple.name: Enigmatic Aura
purple.description: A mysterious & enigmatic hue symbolizing strength

violet.name: Mystic Orchid
violet.description: A magical tone, invoking the allure of rare flowers.

indigo.name: Nightfall Serenade
indigo.description: Mysteriously echoes the melody of the darkening sky.

blue.name: Mount Everest
blue.description: A majestic hue, as vast & serene as the towering peak.

cyan.name: Aqua Whisper
cyan.description: A whisper of aqua, gentle & serene like a tranquil sea.

teal.name: Turquoise Oasis
teal.description: A refreshing oasis of greenish-blue, calming like pristine waters.

green.name: Green Envy
green.description: A shade of envy, lush & vibrant like the heart of nature.

grass.name: Verdant Embrace
grass.description: A vibrant green hue reminiscent of lush, sun-kissed meadows.

orange.name: Radiant Ember
orange.description: Fiery & full of life, like the glow of a burning sun.

brown.name: Cocoa Essence
brown.description: Rich & comforting, akin to the aroma of cocoa.

sky.name: Celestial Frost
sky.description: Ice cold & ethereal, like the frost of a winter morning.

mint.name: Frosted Jade
mint.description: A cool & refreshing tone, akin to frosted precious jade.

lime.name: Sour Citron
lime.description: Citrusy & vibrant, like the zest of a ripe lime.

yellow.name: Golden Glimmer
yellow.description: Glimmering with the brilliance of precious gold.

amber.name: Honeyed Ember
amber.description: Warm & amber-like, reminiscent of sweet golden honey.

gray.name: Misty Moonstone
gray.description: Ethereal & mysterious, like a moonstone veiled in mist.

mauve.name: Velvet Haze
mauve.description: A soft & luxurious hue, enveloping like a velvety mist.

slate.name: Stormy Dusk
slate.description: A dusk-inspired shade, echoing the drama of dark stormy skies.

sage.name: Windy Copper
sage.description: Calming & serene, like the patina of aged copper.

olive.name: Ancient Olive
olive.description: A color with an age-old charm, reminiscent of ancient treasures.

sand.name: Golden Bounty
sand.description: As alluring as it can be, danger lurks in every corner.

bronze.name: Burnished Bronze
bronze.description: A warm & polished hue, reminiscent of ancient bronze artifacts.

gold.name: Gilded Euphoria
gold.description: Exuding pure euphoria, akin to the brilliance of gilded gold.
